Name: Beginner'sGame
About the game: Vecpoly Game latest work Beginner's Game Finally released on Steam! Implement scenario mode though it is a shooting mini game! In the story mode, it is a story depicting one soldier in 2105. And maneuver the soldier's single military fighter and meet the enemies that attack one after another! Billing item? Billing DLC? There is no such thing. Even now, that and future. Support does not correspond? I will respond to support as much as I can. As far as I am delivering only the first episode, I will develop a story with future updates. cut scene is used 3dcg After fighting, the replay function seen on the menu screen, UserBGM function which can pass user's favorite music is also implemented. I might change the specification from the voice of the user! What? Please keep reviewing rapidly! If you want to taste the retro atmosphere, you may want to purchase it. It may be a different thing when I saw it next time. I am in beta testing. Note: Story mode is not complete. We appreciate your understanding.
